alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper; Lauderdale; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 9:58AM CST until January 12 at 10:30AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM CST FOR EASTERN JASPER...SOUTHEASTERN NEWTON...CLARKE AND LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 958 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Suqualena to near Pachuta, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Meridian, Marion, Nellieburg, Stonewall, Meridian Station, Enterprise, Daleville, Savoy, Sable, and Zero around 1005 AM CST. Lauderdale and Middleton around 1010 AM CST. Toomsuba and Causeyville around 1015 AM CST. Snell, Alamucha, and Kewanee around 1020 AM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
